alert.note: Alert for Crosby; Floyd; Hale; Lubbock (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Lubbock, western Floyd, northwestern Crosby and eastern Hale Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles east of Plainview to over Lubbock International Airport. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plainview, Abernathy, Idalou, Lockney, Petersburg, Lorenzo, Lubbock International Airport, South Plains, Aiken, Seth Ward and New Deal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
